variables.input: TICF CRI - Integration - 260731919125,TICF CRI - Production - 710842649290,SSF - Integration - 607267698016,SSF - Production - 891240344376

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter entity.name == $Lambda
| fieldsRemove entity.name

0.content:
## FPAD Infrastructure Dashboard

This dashboard displays infrastructure metrics for the FPAD Production & Integration environments. For further information on see [here](https://govukverify.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/FPAD/pages/3765012906/Technical+solution).

2.title: Gateway Request Count
2.query:
timeseries { countByAccountIdApiName = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.countByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage, default: 0)}, 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }, union: true
| fieldsRename `Count` = countByAccountIdApiName
| limit 100

3.title: Gateway HTTP Errors
3.query:
timeseries { Errors4xx = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.4xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage, default: 0), 
Errors5xx = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage, default: 0)}, 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }, 
union: true

4.title: Gateway Requests and Latencies (all gateways)
4.query:
timeseries { count = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.countByAccountIdApiNameRegion), avgLatency = avg(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion), minLatency = min(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion), maxLatency = max(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion) }, 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }, 
union: true
| fieldsAdd Count = arraySum(count)
| fieldsAdd avgLatency = arrayAvg(avgLatency)
| fieldsAdd minLatency = arrayMin(minLatency)
| fieldsAdd maxLatency = arrayMax(maxLatency)
| fieldsRename `API Name` = apiname
| fieldsRename `Avg Latency` = avgLatency
| fieldsRename `Min Latency` = minLatency
| fieldsRename `Max Latency` = maxLatency

5.title: 4XX Errors at Gateway by Endpoint
5.query:
timeseries `4xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage` = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.4xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage), 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }
| fieldsAdd `4XX Error Count` = arraySum(`4xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage`)
| fieldsRename `API Name` = apiname
| sort `4XX Error Count` desc

6.title: 5XX Errors at Gateway by Endpoint
6.query:
timeseries `5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage` = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage), 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }
| fieldsAdd `5XX Error Count` = arraySum(`5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage`)
| fieldsRename `API Name` = apiname
| sort `5XX Error Count` desc

7.title: Requests Blocked by WAFS (all WAFs)
7.query:
timeseries blockedRequestsByAccountIdRegionRuleWebACL = sum(cloud.aws.wafv2.blockedRequestsByAccountIdRegionRuleWebACL), 
by: { aws.region, aws.account.id, rule, webacl, region }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }
| fieldsAdd Count = arraySum(blockedRequestsByAccountIdRegionRuleWebACL)
| fieldsRename `Region` = aws.region
| fieldsRename `Account` = aws.account.id
| fieldsRename `Rule` = rule
| fieldsRename `Web ACL` = webacl
| sort Count desc

25.title: Invocations

26.title: Total Invocations

27.title: Duration

28.title: Concurrent Executions

29.title: Error Rate

30.title: Error Count

31.title: Throttles

32.title: $Lambda - Request Count & Latency (p50, p90, p95, p99)
32.description: Select a lambda from the dropdown to display the stats for that lambda.

33.title: Recursive Executions Dropped

34.title: Claimed Account Concurrency for $SelectedAWSAccount

35.title: Async Event Age

36.title: Async Events Received

37.title: Iterator Age

38.title: Gateway Request Latency
38.query:
timeseries {avgLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion = avg(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion, default: 0), 
maxLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion = max(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion, default: 0),
minLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion = min(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion, default: 0) }, 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }, union: true
| fieldsRename `Avg Latency` = avgLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion
| fieldsRename `Max Latency` = maxLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion
| fieldsRename `Min Latency` = minLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion
| limit 100

43.title: Read Throttle Events

44.title: Throttled Requests

45.title: Consumed Read Capacity

46.title: Write Throttle Events

47.title: Average Request Latency

48.title: Consumed Write Capacity

49.title: Lambda Status Codes
